html:
Dec 9 (Reuters) - Amazon says in a statement:

  • STRONGLY DISAGREES WITH ITALY ANTITRUST DECISION, WILL APPEAL

  • AMAZON SAYS PROPOSED FINE AND REMEDIES BY ITALY ANTITRUST ARE UNJUSTIFIED AND DISPROPORTIONATE


(Reporting by Milan newsroom)
